[3] The hyperbolic decline in the ADP/O flux ratio with increasing ADP limitation (Fig. 4) is a direct consequence of the linear relation between oxygen flux and ADP flux, and results from the increasing proportion of nonphosphorylating respiration as the resting state is approached (Fig. 4 Inset). [5] In contrast, when the electron transport chain is inhibited by malonate , ADP/O flux ratios remain high, comparable to our results based on oxygen limitation.
